message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this incredible product. Given its value, I'm asking for $1,900,000.
Alice, that price is far too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay something closer to $500,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is far higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000.
Alice, we're still quite far apart on price.  I appreciate you coming down, but I'm afraid I can't go higher than $750,000 at this time.
Bob, this product is truly one-of-a-kind and worth the investment. I'm willing to accept a final offer of $1,100,000.
